course.subject: PHYS
course.name: Introduction to Astrophysics
course.description: Light spectrum and telescope, the Sun, gravitation and relativity, stellar masses and evolution, interstellar medium, star formation, galaxies, clusters of galaxies, active galaxies and quasars, cosmology, solar system.
course.prerequisites: PHYS 2022 AND (MATH 2352 OR PHYS 2124)

reviews.author: Aloha
reviews.comment_content:
-Einstein Field Equation
-Robertson walker metric
-Hubble's Law
-Horizon problem
-Friedmann Equation
-Standard model of particle physics
-thermodynamics at early universe
-Big Bang nucleosynthesis
-CMB anisotropy
-Dark matter
-Dark energy
-Inflation theory
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof好似教得好興奮 但係大部份時間我都係唔知佢講緊啲咩...
用嘅lecture note 同某啲功課題目主要好似係擷取自赫爾辛基大學嘅cosmology I
reviews.comment_grading:
25% Homework
10% Quiz
25% Midterm
40% Final

Grade 個人感覺勁好
reviews.comment_workload:
Homework 一星期一份 難度參差 最難可以有成兩版嘅solution而我係完全睇唔明佢做乜 最易嘅可以用1秒時間就諗到點做
Quiz 其實係attendance分
Midterm 問啲好直接嘅問題
Final 難過midterm 會有啲好難嘅問題
